## Table of ROM checksums

Here are the CRC-16/XModem values for all of the Model T ROMs which
have been reported so far. If you find one not listed, please open an
[issue](issues) so it can be added to the list. Ideally, include a
copy of your ROM, but at a minimum, please send the calculated CRC
and a name to call your ROM variant.

[issues]: https://github.com/hackerb9/crc16-modelt/issues "Report a bug"


### Original system ROMs
The system ROMs as they came from the factory back in the 1980s.
|Machine Name|Version|CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------|-------|-----:|-------:|
| [Kyocera Kyotronic 85](ROMs/Kyocera_Kyotronic_85+orig.bin)             | orig        | F08D | 32K  |
| [NEC PC-8201](ROMs/NEC_PC-8201+A_orig.bin)                             | A, orig     | A48D | 32K  |
| [NEC PC-8201](ROMs/NEC_PC-8201+Japan_orig.bin)                         | Japan, orig | 0508 | 32K  |
| [NEC PC-8300](ROMs/NEC_PC-8300+orig.bin)                               | orig        | 9FF5 | 128K |
| [Olivetti M10 Eur](ROMs/Olivetti_M10_Eur+orig.bin)                     | orig        | 5DD2 | 32K  |
| [Olivetti M10 North America](ROMs/Olivetti_M10_North_America+orig.bin) | orig        | 5D9F | 32K  |
| [Tandy 102 uk](ROMs/Tandy_102_uk+orig.bin)                             | orig        | 5CF0 | 32K  |
| [Tandy 102 us](ROMs/Tandy_102_us+orig.bin)                             | orig        | 1C6F | 32K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M13_orig.bin)                               | M13, orig   | 3D1A | 8.0K |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M14_orig.bin)                               | M14, orig   | 958C | 32K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M15_orig.bin)                               | M15, orig   | 9535 | 32K  |
| [Televerket Modell 100](ROMs/Televerket_Modell_100+orig.bin)           | orig        | 2A64 | 32K  |
| [TRS-80 Model 100](ROMs/TRS-80_Model_100+orig.bin)                     | orig        | 34F5 | 32K  |

### ROM Variants
Modified ROMs will have different checksums than the original. Examples:
* Y2K patches

* The Virtual T emulator can dynamically update the ROMs to show the
  version on the main menu. 

* Stephen Adolph's "[REX Classic][rexclassic]" Option ROM could
  replace the system ROM with a modified version for "[Main ROM
  Management][rexmanagement]".

[rexclassic]: https://github.com/bkw777/REX_Classic "Rex Classic Respin by BKW"
[rexmanagement]: https://bitchin100.com/wiki/index.php?title=Main_ROM_Management_Feature

See also this project's [directory of sample ROMs](ROMs). The files
are mostly mirrored from https://tandy.wiki/), but renamed so that
variations are listed after a plus sign.
|Machine Name|Version|CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------|-------|-----:|-------:|
| [Kyocera Kyotronic 85](ROMs/Kyocera_Kyotronic_85+y2k.bin)             | y2k               | 64A8 | 32K  |
| [NEC PC-8201](ROMs/NEC_PC-8201+A_REX_y2k.bin)                         | A, REX, y2k       | 87F7 | 32K  |
| [NEC PC-8201](ROMs/NEC_PC-8201+A_y2k.bin)                             | A, y2k            | 8CA0 | 32K  |
| [NEC PC-8300](ROMs/NEC_PC-8300+y2k.bin)                               | y2k               | E3A9 | 128K |
| [Olivetti M10 Eur](ROMs/Olivetti_M10_Eur+y2k.bin)                     | y2k               | 1B13 | 32K  |
| [Olivetti M10 North America](ROMs/Olivetti_M10_North_America+y2k.bin) | y2k               | 5E44 | 32K  |
| [Tandy 102](ROMs/Tandy_102+REX_y2k.bin)                               | REX, y2k          | 870F | 32K  |
| [Tandy 102 uk](ROMs/Tandy_102_uk+y2k.bin)                             | y2k               | 9EC4 | 32K  |
| [Tandy 102 us](ROMs/Tandy_102_us+y2k.bin)                             | y2k               | DE5B | 32K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M13_REX.bin)                               | M13, REX          | B76F | 20K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M15_corrupt.bin)                           | M15, corrupt      | 7C97 | 32K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M15M13M14.bin)                             | M15M13M14         | C061 | 72K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M15M13M14_y2k.bin)                         | M15M13M14, y2k    | 9534 | 72K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M15_REX_corrupt.bin)                       | M15, REX, corrupt | 25C3 | 32K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M15_REX_y2k.bin)                           | M15, REX, y2k     | 3EFF | 32K  |
| [Tandy 200](ROMs/Tandy_200+M15_y2k.bin)                               | M15, y2k          | 67AB | 32K  |
| [TRS-80 Model 100](ROMs/TRS-80_Model_100+LibROM-1.1a.bin)             | LibROM-1.1a       | 60F0 | 32K  |
| [TRS-80 Model 100](ROMs/TRS-80_Model_100+REX_y2k.bin)                 | REX, y2k          | AF95 | 32K  |
| [TRS-80 Model 100](ROMs/TRS-80_Model_100+y2k.bin)                     | y2k               | F6C1 | 32K  |
| [TRS-80 Model 100 uk](ROMs/TRS-80_Model_100_uk+skl.bin)               | skl               | 7A77 | 32K  |
| [TRS-80 Model 100 uk](ROMs/TRS-80_Model_100_uk+y2k.bin)               | y2k               | A010 | 32K  |
| [TRS-80 Model 100 us](ROMs/TRS-80_Model_100_us+26-3802B.bin)          | 26-3802B          | 6224 | 32K  |

### Other related ROMs
These ROMs are not system ROMs for Kyotronic-like computers, but they
are related.
|Machine Name|Version|CRC-16|ROM size|
|------------|-------|-----:|-------:|
| [HD61830](ROMs/other/HD61830+lcd_chargen.bin)                            | lcd, chargen | 70C3 | 4.0K |
| [NEC PC-8300 Beckman-E3.2](ROMs/other/NEC_PC-8300_Beckman-E3.2+orig.bin) | orig         | 4793 | 32K  |
| [Tandy 600](ROMs/other/Tandy_600+BASIC.bin)                              | BASIC        | A2B3 | 32K  |
